member.name: T:PX.Api.Webhooks.IWebhookHandler
member.summary: An interface for implementation of webhook processing. An implementation class for this interface processes the requests passed to a particular URL.
member.example: You can find an example of the interface implementation on GitHub.

member.name: M:PX.Api.Webhooks.IWebhookHandler.HandleAsync(PX.Api.Webhooks.WebhookContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Processes the webhook requests.
member.param: The information about the webhook invocation.

remarks.para: In the method implementation, you do the following:

list.item: Process authentication information in the request.
Transform the data in the external format to the data that can be saved in Acumatica ERP.
Invoke graph methods that save the data in Acumatica ERP.
